name: 2D-Zelda Demo Project
description:
Controls:
Movement: W/A/S/D || Arrow Keys || Joystick
Interact/Confirm: Spacebar || Controller-A
Pause: ESC || Controller Start
Inventory: E || Controller Select
Item Keys: J/K/L || Controller X/Y/B

Special features:
Dynamic VGM - Additional Instruments play when encountering enemies.
Camera borders should automatically adjust for every screen size.
Seamless switching between keyboard and gamepad.
[I've only tested Xbox360 controller compatibility]

Save Data will be created in this Folder when you save:
C:\Users\$USERNAME\AppData\LocalLow\AmpStudios\Zelda_Demo

100% of the assets have been created by myself, this includes:
Code, Sprites, Animations, VGM and SFX

This project has been in the works for several months,
I'd love to hear what you think.
